name: browserify-demo
description: A working demo of CSS Modules using browserify

scripts.browserify: browserify -t [babelify --presets es2015 --presets react] -p [css-modulesify --after postcss-color-rebeccapurple --after autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 5%' -o dist/main.css --json dist/css-modules.json] -o dist/index.js src/index.js
scripts.watchify: watchify -v -t [babelify --presets es2015 --presets react] -p [css-modulesify --after postcss-color-rebeccapurple --after autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 5%' -o dist/main.css] -o dist/index.js src/index.js
scripts.copy: cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/components/0-Logo/logo.svg dist/logo.svg
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run browserify
scripts.budo: budo src/index.js:index.js --dir=dist -- -t [babelify --presets es2015 --presets react] -p [css-modulesify --after postcss-color-rebeccapurple --after autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 5%' -o dist/main.css --json dist/css-modules.json] -o dist/index.js src/index.js | opnr | garnish
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run budo

author: Josh Johnston
